attributes.review: If i could give this app a rating of -5 i would, it made my phone extremely slow and even took personal information from other apps i have. It  is absolutely absurd and insane that our president could put out an app like this✨🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.title: A complete waste of time, thought it was going to be better

attributes.review: this app is so bad it killed my pet turtle named Oscar. and now I have to go get a cat from the pet store and I absolutely despise cats and I’m going to name it lampshade. my mother is also making me go to therapy because I was so attached to Oscar. this app also caused my phone to shut down and I had to get a new phone so now I’m working with a iPod first generation instead of my iPhone XR. DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🤪🤢🧚‍♀️🤮🤡
attributes.title: so baddd 🤪🍆🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and it took so long for it to install (makes me wonder what it was doing on my phone). I’m scared for my safety and security of my being in America. While I love my president he needs to invest in making a better app like he invested in dehumanizing immigrants. Please update and delete the unnecessary (like this app).💙❤️🤍
attributes.title: This app is dangerous to your phone...and life🤭🤯

attributes.review: This man has been president for too long now and y’all see how everything went down hill for America since he’s been president and he’s talkin bout sum ”make America great again” he doin the opposite smh and whoever supporting the app is also supporting a racist and evil person to run out country and even worse he a raper like y’all really want that to be y’all president I think not.
attributes.title: The ORANGE CLOwN

attributes.review: This app took entirely too long to download, such a disappointment, then when I was finally able to open it, I was hit with a TON of push notifications about this dude, went to my settings to turn them off and this app doesn’t allow you to turn them off!?! Absolutely insane, would rate lower if possible.
attributes.title: DONT EVEN BOTHER DOWNLOADING..

attributes.review: I seriously disappointed and disgusted by this app when I first opened it up it showed Donald trump twerking i was so horrified that I had to bleach my eyes 🕳👄🕳 when I closed the app it gave me a notification of an update I opened it I was another video of trump dancing on a pole I was lost in words it wouldn’t let me close the app until the whole video was over 🤮🤮
attributes.title: HORRIBLE SERVICE

attributes.review: I am basically in love with trump but after downloading this i can’t even look at him. This app made me take a personality test when i first logged in and it told me in ENTJ! I AM NOT AN EXTROVERT. After that it made me answer questions like what’s my fave fast food place and fave color like really is that necessary. Then it asked for a picture of my cat. No donny you can’t see mr. whiskers. WORST APP EVER
attributes.title: no no and no

attributes.review: This app is terrible, within minutes of downloading this app Karens from all over came out of nowhere and started screaming and ranting incoherently. The only words I understood while they were foaming at the mouth was ‘manager’, a few racial and homophobic slurs. This went on for 20 minutes before I realized all I needed to do was delete this horrible app and register to vote! REGISTER TO VOTE.
attributes.title: Karen magnet

attributes.review: Omg trust me it is sooo bad barley any good it took a hole day to download then it kept crashing and turning off my phone for no reason almost got me locked out my phone and I barely right reviews but this is a need to write one and when u open it plss don’t let your kids get it omg it’s the worst part plss don’t omg 😭and now I’m blind for what the app did to me
attributes.title: Don’t get it at all

attributes.review: This app took 4 HOURS to download on my WiFi! When it finally finished downloading I noticed that all of my contacts were deleted, my chosen language was Russian and I couldn’t change it back! I just wanted to help President Trump Keep America Great, but I can’t handle this awful app. :( don’t waste your time trying to download.
attributes.title: Don’t download. Waste of time.
